title: Staples Center, Chris Tucker, Sneaky Friend, Shaq's Ex and more.
itunes:title: Staples Center, Chris Tucker, Sneaky Friend, Shaq's Ex and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! The CLO is dumbfounded today by a proposal. Shaunie O'Neal is IG official and engaged. Chris Tucker sets the record straight about the Friday movie franchise. Bitterman talks about the things that need to be fixed at your house just in time for your guests. Pimpin' got some cool picks for NFL week 11. Something sneaky and freaky is happening in Arizona. Is the Staples Center name change business or disrespect? Would You Rather is equal opportunity today. Today as he wraps up the show, we find out that His Flyness will be launching a new clothing line. Have a great weekend!!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
